notes.title: Funding
notes.p: This project was funded by the National Natural Science Foundation of China (81773489), Social Science and Technology Innovation Subject in Chongqing (cstc2015shmszx120070), the Technology Basic and Advanced Research Projects in Chongqing (cstc2014jcyjA10069). The funders had no role in study design, data collection and analysis, decision to publish, or preparation of the manuscript.
